# contact

**Instance Property**

The contact that the template displays.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var contact: CPContact { get set }
```

## Discussion

Assigning a new instance of [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPContact] updates the template.

## Configuring the Contact

- **CPContact**: A data object that contains information about a contact.
